title: Patch v1.1.0 - The Phoenix Update
content: Major rebalancing of item volatility. New "Phoenix" profile unlocked for players who have recovered from a major loss. Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

title: Major Update: The Loan System
content: Introducing the ability to take out loans from the bank. Be careful with interest rates and due dates!

title: Scheduled Maintenance
content: The market will be down for scheduled maintenance on Dec 5th from 02:00 to 04:00 UTC. We apologize for any inconvenience.

title: Minor Bug Fixes
content: Addressed several minor bugs related to UI display and data synchronization.

title: New Item: Quantum Toaster
content: A revolutionary new item now available in the market. Experience breakfast like never before!

title: Server Upgrade Complete
content: Our servers have been successfully upgraded, leading to improved performance and stability.
